title: Moscon 1
description: A program book for the first MosCon in 1979. Guests of Honor: Verna Smith Trestrail and Alex Schomburg. Fan Guest of Honor: Jessica Amanda Salmonson. This program includes biographies of Verna Smith Trestrail, Edward E. Smith, Ph.D, Alex Schomburg, and Jessica Amanda Salmonson; appreciations for Clifford D. Simak, L. Sprague de Camp, and Frederik Pohl; and a special tribute entitled "LARGER THAN LIFE A Memoir in Tribute to Dr. Edward E. Smith" by Robert A. Heinlein.
committee: Chairman: Steve Fahnestalk; Security: Larry Oakford; Hotel Liaison: Sasha Zemanek; Operations: Mike Finkbiner; Art Show: Jane Fancher; Programming: Charlie Leaphart; Membership: Beth Finkbiner; Movies: Don Qualls; Publicity: Jon Gustafson; Secretary: Bea Taylor; Treasurer: Vickie Mitchell; Hucksters: Charlie Leaphart; Gophers: Tim Cridland; Also: Bill Profit; Matt Cherry; Jerry Eveland; Jeannie Wood; Dean Smith; Nina Hoffman; Debbie Miller; Ruth Vance; Chris Nelson; Dru Daily
